'''MBÍRIL''' is an [[Elvish]] [[sundocarme|root]], a compound of [[MIR]] and [[RIL]].<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 372</ref><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 34</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''miril'' (or ''mirilli''; "shining jewel"); ''mirilya-'' ("glitter")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Ilkorin]]: ''bril'' ("glass, crystal")<ref name=LR/>

==See also==

*[[MIR]]
